actions.text: Amendment SA 944 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 944 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 932. (consideration: CR S8184; text: CR S8184) To prohibit an eligible entity offering a Medicare Prescription Drug plan, a Medicare Advantage Organization offering a MedicareAdvantage plan, and other health plans from contracting with a pharmacy benefit manager (PBM) unless the PBM satisfies certain requirements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 944 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 932.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 944 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

amends_amendment.purpose: To improve disclosure requirements and to increase beneficiary choices.

purpose: To prohibit an eligible entity offering a Medicare Prescription Drug plan, a Medicare Advantage Organization offering a MedicareAdvantage plan, and other health plans from contracting with a pharmacy benefit manager (PBM) unless the PBM satisfies certain requirements.
